pullrequest.title: win_addpath.bat updated to work with gazebo 8

content.raw: I checked again and tried to build gazebo9 on windows from scratch following the tutorial. Lots of changes were needed. Follow [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3174/fix-gazebo9-build-and-run-on-windows](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3174/fix-gazebo9-build-and-run-on-windows/diff) . This PR can be closed, I think. My plan is to try to build gazebo default once we agree that my approach for gazebo 9 is good.
content.html: I checked again and tried to build gazebo9 on windows from scratch following the tutorial. Lots of changes were needed. Follow #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3174/fix-gazebo9-build-and-run-on-windows . This PR can be closed, I think. My plan is to try to build gazebo default once we agree that my approach for gazebo 9 is good.
